text: Thanks for doing this image gallery project. Thanks to this I've started to create my own blog using ravendb and are using your code as a reference. It's helping me learn alot, not just about ravendb but of TDD as well as MVC.

Absolutely my pleasure :)Caveat: Don't take anything I do for gospel, especially the TDD elements - I'm a self professed "not very good tester" and I'm still struggling to balance value with coverage.

I have drawn a lot of inspiration from your project and really appreciate the effort you are putting into it. I'm still struggling a bit to shift my thinking and embrace RavenDB but on a whole what you are presenting here has been very helpful.  Thank you.
